meanings.definition: A traditional South African drink made from fermented mealie meal.
meanings.sent1: I tried mahewu for the first time at the festival.
meanings.sent2: In South Africa, many people enjoy drinking mahewu with their meals.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled as they sipped on the fizzy mahewu.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of mahewu filled the room, reminding me of home.
meanings.sent5: The vendor sold refreshing mahewu on a hot summer day.
